stages.name: Bismillah
stages.english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

stages.name: Verse 1
stages.instruction: These are the mystical letters whose meaning is known only to Allah

stages.name: Verse 2
stages.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
stages.english: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah
stages.transliteration: Dhalika al-kitabu la rayba feehi hudan lilmuttaqeen
stages.instruction: Acknowledge the certainty and guidance of the Quran

stages.name: Verse 3
stages.arabic: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
stages.english: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them
stages.transliteration: Allatheena yu'minoona bil ghaybi wa yuqeemoon as-salata wa mimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon
stages.instruction: Understand the qualities of the righteous

stages.name: Verse 4
stages.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
stages.english: And who believe in what has been revealed to you [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain
stages.transliteration: Wallatheena yu'minoona bima onzila ilayka wa ma onzila min qablika wa bil-akhirati hum yooqinoon
stages.instruction: Learn about belief in divine revelations and the Hereafter

stages.name: Verse 5
stages.arabic: أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًى مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
stages.english: Those are upon [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful
stages.transliteration: Ola-ika 'ala hudan min rabbihim wa-ula-ika humul muflihoon
stages.instruction: Understand the reward of the righteous

stages.name: Verse 6
stages.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
stages.english: Indeed, those who disbelieve - it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe
stages.transliteration: Innal-latheena kafaroo sawa-on 'alayhim a-anthartahum am lam tunthirhum la yu'minoon
stages.instruction: Learn about those who reject guidance

stages.name: Verse 7
stages.arabic: خَتَمَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَعَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِمْ ۖ وَعَلَىٰ أَبْصَارِهِمْ غِشَاوَةٌ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
stages.english: Allah has set a seal upon their hearts and upon their hearing, and over their vision is a veil. And for them is a great punishment
stages.transliteration: Khatamal-lahu 'ala quloobihim wa 'ala sam'ihim wa 'ala absarihim ghishawatun wa lahum 'athabun 'atheem
stages.instruction: Understand the consequence of persistent disbelief
